title: @Riot Forecast Janna double jokes
body:
So here is what happens:
1. play forecast janna on any map
2. go against classic skin janna (not sure if it does this with her skins that don't have the special taunt)
3. joke anywhere on map
Classic Janna joke will go along with the special joke that is in forecast (i.e. "For only 2.95 a minute, I'll leave you breathless will go at the same time as "A little precipitation is nothing to have a bad hair day about") Also, both the enemy team and ally team can hear the overlapping jokes. I tested this myself to be sure it was the other janna in the team that resulted in it.
I know it isn't a game breaking bug, but it is something that ruins the enjoyment of having and using the skin. Please fix Rito.

replies.body:
Hiya PrincessKairi! 

Thanks for the report! ^-^ 

We'll take a listen and see what's going on here.
Thanks! Would love an update when the issue is fixed if possible. Have a nice night Katey!

Heyo! 

So, the goal is to resolve for 6.7, but it depends on bandwidth, so no promises. It's definitely on our radar, though. Figured I'd give you some sort of an update! ^-^

FIFY:
Step 1) gives riot money 

yeah going to opt out.
